original_text: I hope in the Lord Jesus to send Timothy to you soon, that I also may be cheered when I receive news about you.
korean_text: 내가 디모데를 속히 너희에게 보내기를 주 안에서 바람은 너희의 사정을 앎으로 안위를 받으려 함이니

sentences.original_text: I hope in the Lord Jesus
to send Timothy to you soon
that I also may be cheered
sentences.korean_translation: 나 또한 기쁨을 얻을 수 있도록

sentences.original_text: when I receive news about you
